title: Malaise
summaries: The Malaise is a yoyo that can be crafted with Demonite Bars, which only come from worlds generated with Corruption. It has slightly higher knockback, range, and duration than its Crimson counterpart, the Artery, but slightly lower damage.
It has a spin duration of 7 seconds and can reach up to 14 tiles.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
